channel.title: Productivity on Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti

item.title: Developer Productivity - I
item.description: I used to be very passionate about developer productivity for years. I guess I still am. But my outlook and methods have changed a lot. I want to write all this down before I forget it. Yes, my memory is short. Ten years ago I had just joined a medium-sized company from a tiny startup and I immediately began noticing how much my productivity had come down. And I found fault with the tools and the version control system being used.
